quizzes.question: Enter the tag corresponding to the list item:
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]HTML Ordered Lists[/h1] An ordered list starts with the [b]
    [/b] tag, and each list item is defined by the [b]
  1. [/b] tag. Here is an example of an [b]ordered list[/b]: [code format="html" codeId="25"] first page [b]
      [/b] [b]
    1. [/b]Red[b]
      2. [/b] [b]
    2. [/b]Blue[b]
      3. [/b] [b]
    3. [/b]Green[b]
      4. [/b] [b]
    [/b] [/code] [b]Result:[/b] [img id="2536" width="100%"] [note]The list items will be automatically marked with numbers.[/note]

[h1]HTML Unordered List [/h1] An unordered list starts with the [b]
    [/b]tag. [code format="html" codeId="26"] first page [b]
      [/b] [b]
    • [/b]Red[b]
      • [/b] [b]
    • [/b]Blue[b]
      • [/b] [b]
    • [/b]Green<[b]/li>[/b] [b]
    [/b] [/code] [b]Result:[/b] [img id="2537" width="100%"] [note]The list items will be marked with bullets.[/note]
